title: New: Fickle Friends – For You
content:
Brighton’s Fickle Friends have just released a new track entitled For You and it’s a jumping three and a half minutes of excitement.

The production is glistening and the melodies shoot a dose of nostalgia straight to the heart. This is great stuff from a band that is surely going places.

For You is out 23rd September in North America via Crazy Heart Records and is available now in the U.K.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
